verses.name: Jeremiah 2:28
verses.text: But where are thy gods that thou hast made thee? let them arise, if they can save thee in the time of thy trouble: for according to the number of thy cities are thy gods, O Judah.

verses.name: Jeremiah 2:29
verses.text: Wherefore will ye plead with me? ye all have transgressed against me, saith the Lord.

verses.name: Jeremiah 2:30
verses.text: In vain have I smitten your children; they received no correction: your own sword hath devoured your prophets, like a destroying lion.
